title: MAG 090 - Body Builder Transcript
text:
providing more details on addresses, names, and stuff, seems to be missing, so 
we don’t have any way of tracking down the gym, or finding out the name the 
business might be operating under. Not without a 2013 copy of the Aberdeen 
Yellow Pages. A bit of relief, in some ways. I tried to contact Mr. Davenport 
about it, and did get through, but he told me to… um, he… he… wishes no 
further contact with the Institute. 
Melanie looked into Marie Balandin, though. In 2011 and 2012, she did really 
well in several IFBB competitions, but it looks like she disappeared around the 
time of this statement. No missing persons report was ever filed, but there’s 
no record of her anywhere after that. 

The Magnus Archives – MAG090 – Body Builder 
14 
 
The last official mention seems to be a police report filed on August 23rd, 
2013, which lists her as a ‘person of interest’ in a series of animal mutilations 
on a farm about five miles west of Aberdeen. A bunch of sheep were found 
dead, with their femurs removed. Look, I, I know we’re not meant to speculate 
in these bits, but… well, I just… I wonder what she was planning to do with 
them. 
There. Well, that’s, er… That’s it. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
